original_title: L'ascension de la Pyramide de "Chéops" par S.A.R. le Prince Léopold
overview: During his 1923 visit to Cairo, Prince Leopold III of Belgium climbed the Cheops pyramid. The film was shot by Tullio Chiarini, Italian photographer, cinematographer and correspondent in Cairo and Alexandria.
title: L'ascension de la Pyramide de "Chéops" par S.A.R. le Prince Léopold
